trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCEMJGAMETABLE_00547_Q1_000_001<tab>This table is for novices. Would you like to challenge <var 28 ((Addon)) F2303A01 /var>, <var 28 ((Addon)) F2303B01 /var>, and <var 28 ((Addon)) F2303C01 /var> to a game of mahjong?
